option.replace: Replace source file and continue processing
option.createnew: Create new file with ocr - stop processing here.
option.textonly: Process found text (no change on source)

Tip:
'Process found text'
, if you are not sure. This will leave the source file untouched.

'Create new file with ocr'
- create a new file in parallel with additional '-ocr'. This will trigger a new process.

'Replace source file...'
will replace the source file with the OCR enriched version.
